exp.desc:
_Internship At Kanakdristi_ 
 Worked across frontend and backend on client-facing and internal platforms. Built responsive UIs with Next.js, Nuxt.js, Tailwind CSS, and GSAP, and developed backend features and API integrations using Express.js and NestJS. Contributed to a travel CRM using React (Vite), Zustand, React Query, and MUI.

_SDE Trainee at ETH Infra_ 
 Core contributor across frontend, backend, and system-level tasks â€” acting as a central execution layer for the team. I work on building and maintaining scalable web and app solutions, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and ensuring smooth cross-team delivery. I contribute wherever impact is needed, keeping systems stable, fast, and production-ready.
